reviewText:
Obra maestra de la musica en español y el rock argentino.
Una referencia para todos aquellos conocedores de la musica del genero rock sifonico y rock psicodelico.
Sobre el DVD, es un retrato de una epoca, donde se hizo mucho con pocos recursos audiovisuales y tecnologicos

Masterpiece of Spanish music and Argentine rock.
A reference for all those connoisseurs of the music of the genre sifonic rock and psychedelic rock.
About the DVD, it is a portrait of an era, where much was done with few audio-visual and technological resources.

A badly recorded DVD of a band 5 years behind it's time, that did a quite bad Crosby Stills and Nash imitation. It was the last Summer before the coup d'etat of 1976, which resulted in the end of innocence of the Argentine youth... or was it in 1982 in the malvinas war against the UK, Europe, the USA, and Chile? Goodbye Sui Generis, and thank you for the muzak... and don't come back!

I'm 41 now and i remember i listened to this concert about 27 years ago, when a friend of my brother brought a tape, and i thought...i hope someday i could see this on video!!...Well, here it is!!  It is really amazing how the filmmaker captures the esence of these troubled times in Argentina...look at the face of the people in this movie, you can really feel being a part of the crowd in this concert!!

Tengo 41 ahora y recuerdo que escuché este concierto hace 27 años cuando un amigo de mi hermano trajo un cassette y pensé...ojalá pudiera verlo en video algún día!!...Aquí está!! Es realmente asombroso cómo el director captura la esencia de los problemas de la Argentina en esa época...sólo vean la cara de las personas y sientan la angustia que los agobiaba por la dictadura y todo lo demás...Realmente se siente uno parte de la audiencia en este DVD!!
